item.title: Apple Opening New Retail Store in Japan This Weekend
item.description: Apple has announced that it will be opening a new retail store in the in the heart of Osaka, Japan, on Saturday, July 26. Apple Umeda is the second Apple store to open in Osaka and the 11th to open in

item.title: The Demise of China’s Hottest Online Shopping Craze
item.description: As China’s digital economy matures, community group-buying platforms are being replaced by faster, more convenient delivery services.
